meanings.definition: A device with buttons and a directional pad used to control video games.
meanings.sent1: I played the game using the joypad to move my character and press buttons.
meanings.sent2: The joypad on the controller helped me navigate through the game easily.
meanings.sent3: The joypad felt like a magic wand, guiding my character through the virtual world.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the joypad, directing the on-screen action with precision.
meanings.sent5: The joypad became an extension of my hand, seamlessly connecting me to the game.

meanings.definition: To control or manipulate using a joypad.
meanings.sent1: I joypad the game effortlessly, mastering the controls in no time.
meanings.sent2: She joypads the character with finesse, making every move look effortless.
meanings.sent3: He joypads the game as if conducting an orchestra, orchestrating every action with skill.
meanings.sent4: They joypad the gameplay like skilled pilots, navigating through challenges with ease.
meanings.sent5: Joypading the game felt like painting a masterpiece, each button press adding a new stroke to the canvas.
